The Skorchers and The Player's History of Norrath have both moved away from geocities. Here are their new addresses:

The Skorchers: http://www.eqcentral.net/skorchers/

A Player's History of Norrath (unaffiliated with the skorchers guild): http://www.eqcentral.net/skorchers/history.html

The Skorchers is an evil guild for the online game of EverQuest that is open only to the ogre and troll races. The Player's History of Norrath is a group of written histories from several players who wanted to write about EverQuest's world of Norrath. If you have any questions- email the head of the skorchers and keeper of the history here: Blkdragon@ten.net
